CustomField.description: This checkbox is automatically selected when the value 'Other' is included in the Partner Accreditations multi-select picklist. It is used to control the visibility of the 'Other' details field on the page layout.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This checkbox indicates that 'Other' has been selected in the Partner Accreditations. It is used for conditional visibility to display additional details when applicable. Users do not need to update this field manually.
CustomField.label: Partner Accreditations Is Other
